SELECT ANNOUNCE_NO, ANNOUNCE_NAME, ANNOUNCE_COUNT, MEMBER_NICKNAME,
CASE
WHEN SYSDATE - ANNOUNCE_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - ANNOUNCE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - ANNOUNCE_DATE < 1 /24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - ANNOUNCE_DATE) * 24 * 60)|| '분 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - ANNOUNCE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - ANNOUNCE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(ANNOUNCE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END ANNOUNCE_DATE
FROM "ANNOUNCEMENT" B JOIN "MEMBER" M ON(B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE B.ANNOUNCE_DEL_FL ='N' ORDER BY ANNOUNCE_NO DESC
